name: tw
description: Teamwork Projects CLI and git integration.

scripts.bin-tool: sed -i.bak s/babel-node\ --/node/g ./build/bin/* && rm build/bin/*.bak && rename build/bin/*.js --delete=".js" && chmod +x build/bin/* && cp ./package.json build/package.json
scripts.build: mkdir -p ./build/bin && ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./bin/* -d ./build && mkdir build/src && ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./src -d ./build/src && npm run bin-tool

author: Adrian Cooney <adrian.cooney@teamwork.com>
